definitions.text: a verb tense that expresses actions or states in the future
bulk commodities bought or sold at an agreed price for delivery at a specified future date

examples: some future historian will evaluate him

definitions.text: effective in or looking toward the future
examples: he was preparing for future employment opportunities

definitions.text: (of elected officers) elected but not yet serving
a verb tense or other formation referring to events or states that have not yet happened
